Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of design outputs compared to the design specifications.

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.KPIS: Time to Market for Mechanical Designs
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from initial mechanical design concept to market launch.
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: Total Time from Mechanical Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the performance of mechanical designs based on specified criteria (e.g., durability, functionality).
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: Average Performance Score of Mechanical Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for mechanical design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: (Actual Mechanical Design Cost / Budgeted Mechanical Design Cost) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of designs requiring rework before final approval.
Measures the percentage of mechanical designs that pass all testing criteria.
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Mechanical Tests / Total Mechanical Tests) * 100

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of mechanical designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Mechanical Designs

Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for mechanical designs.
Product Development+Engineering+Mechanic.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Mechanical Design / Number of Customers)
